title: 3 immunity booster drinks that you must have every morning | The Times of India
description: A strong immune system prepares your body to fight foreign disease-causing pathogens and reduces the risk of infection.
cleaned_text: daily in the morning The number of COVID-19 positive cases are rising rapidly in the country. The double mutation of the coronavirus variant is more infectious than the previous one, so it is of utmost priority to take extra care of our health, hygiene and immunity at the current time. A strong immune system prepares your body to fight foreign disease-causing pathogens and reduces the risk of infection. Although building immunity is a time taking process and can be achieved by making a constant effort, there are several ways to give a little boost to your immune health and drinking Ayurvedic concoction is just one of them. Here we have listed 3 powerful herbal drinks that you must have every day on an empty stomach to stay fit and healthy. [readmore](javascript://) 02/7Immunity booster 1 Ingredients: 1 cup (ACV) 1 tsp honey How to make it: Add water, ginger and turmeric to a deep pan and bring it to boil (5-10 mins). Once the water starts boiling, turn off the stove and let the concoction cool down a little. Strain the drink in a cup and add honey and ACV to it. [readmore](javascript://) 03/7How this drink helps This drink is loaded with health-friendly ingredients that possess anti-inflammatory and anti-bacterial properties. Apple cider vinegar (ACV) prohibits the growth of bad pathogens in the body and promotes the growth of healthy gut bacteria, which is essential for strong immunity. Both the roots, turmeric and ginger are loaded with antioxidants, anti-inflammatory and antiseptic properties. Turmeric is a natural healer, while ginger increases the number of white blood cells, which helps to destroy foreign pathogens. [readmore](javascript://) 04/7Immunity booster 2 Ingredients: 1/2 tsp ajwain seeds 5 Basil or Tulsi leaves 1/2 tsp of black pepper powder 1 tsp honey How to make it: Take a pan and add 1 glass of water, carom seeds, black pepper and basil leaves in it. Let the water boil for 5 minutes. Turn off the gas and strain the concoction in a cup. Let the mixture cool down for a while before adding honey to it. [readmore](javascript://) 05/7How this drink helps Ajwain or carom seeds have powerful medicinal properties and have been used for treating different health ailments for a long time. The anti-inflammatory properties of this commonly available spice can help to boost immunity and provide relief from severe cold and cough. Adding basil leaves, black pepper and honey to this drink makes the concoction even more effective. [readmore](javascript://) 06/7Immunity booster 3 Ingredients: 6-7 Basil or Tulsi leaves 5 Cloves 1 tsp grated ginger 1 cup Giloy juice 2 tbsp Lemon juice Black salt How to make it: Take a pan and add one cup of water, tulsi leaves, cloves and ginger in it. Let the concoction boil for 5 minutes. Strain the mixture in a glass bottle and store it. Add 1 teaspoon of this mixture to 1 cup of Giloy juice and add a pinch of black salt and a dash of lemon juice to it. Mix it well and drink it every morning. [readmore](javascript://) 07/7How this drink helps Giloy is packed with antioxidants properties that can help to fight disease-causing free radicals in the body. This time tested Ayurvedic herb can also help to remove toxins, purify the blood, prevent liver diseases and urinary tract infections. Tulsi, ginger and clove also exhibit antimicrobial, antibiotic, and anti-inflammatory properties and adding them to this drink can improve the taste and boost the immune health.
